comments.body: Curious nit: Can these two lines [82-83] be replaced by a single call to `pumpAndSettle`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +106,110 @@    await tester.press(find.byKey(const ValueKey<String>('barrier')));
    await tester.pump(); // begin transition
    await tester.pump(const Duration(seconds: 1)); // end transition

    expect(find.byKey(const ValueKey<String>('barrier')), findsNothing,

comments.body: Can you keep the existing test to ensure that this continues to work as is and add a new test instead?
There should probably be a test that verifies the dismiss happens on the up. It looks like this test would also pass when the dismiss happened on the down?
I've changed the tests, now they verify that dismiss happens during the pointer up event
